high_descs: turn around and walk straight towards the window
pick up the statue on the window
turn around and walk straight towards the bed then turn right then turn left then turn right towards the dresser
put the statue down on the dresser
tasks.task_desc: move the statue from the window to the dresser

high_descs: Turn around, go to the statue on the shelf.
Pick up the statue on the shelf.
Turn around, bring the statue to the dresser on the right.
Put the statue on the dresser, right of the CD.
tasks.task_desc: Put a statue on a dresser.

high_descs: Turn around and move to the window to the left of the shelves.
Pick up the bronze trophy from the sill in front of the window.
Turn around, move towards the bed, then turn right and move to the white wooden dresser.
Place the trophy between the CD and the set of keys on top of the dresser.
tasks.task_desc: Place a trophy on the dresser.

high_descs: turn right, walk to bed, turn left, walk to the window
pick up the statue that is on the window ledge
turn around, walk to bed, turn right, take a step, turn left, take a few steps, turn right, walk to the dresser
put the statue on the dresser
tasks.task_desc: move statue from window to dresser

high_descs: Turn right, turn left at the bed, turn right at the foot of the bed, turn left and walk to the windowsill.
Pick up the sculpture on the right.
Turn around and walk to the dresser on the right.
Put the sculpture down on the dresser to the left of the keys.
tasks.task_desc: To move a sculpture to the dresser.

high_descs: Turn around to walk all the way across the room to the window with the two statues.
Pick up the statue on the right.
Turn around and make a right to reach the dresser.
Set the statue down in between the two clocks on the dresser.
tasks.task_desc: Pick up a statue to move to the dresser.

high_descs: Turn around and go to the right end of of the dresser.
Pick up the CD on the dresser, behind the statue.
Turn to your left and go to the book shelf, past the window.
Place the CD on the bottom, left shelf of the books on the book shelf.
tasks.task_desc: Put a CD on the book shelf.

high_descs: Turn around, go to the wall, turn left
Pick up the cd on the dresser
Turn left, go forward, turn left in front of the shelf
Put the cd on the bottom shelf
tasks.task_desc: Put the cd onto the shelf

high_descs: turn around and move the the cupboard
pick up the disk from the cupboard
turn around and head to the shelf
place the disk at the bottom of the shelf
tasks.task_desc: place a disk at the bottom of  the shelf

high_descs: Move to the dresser on the right
Pick up the CD on the dresser
Turn around and move to the entertainment center on the left
Place the CD on the entertainment center
tasks.task_desc: Move the CD from the dresser to the entertainment center

high_descs: Turn left and face the dresser with the clock and other items on it.
Pick the disc up from the dresser.
Go right and then turn right again before turning left to face the brown shelves.
Put the disc on the bottom left shelf.
tasks.task_desc: Put a disc on a shelf.

high_descs: Move to the left facing the dresser where the CD is
Pick up the CD in the middle of the dresser
Carry the CD to the wood shelving unit against the wall
Place the CD on the bottom left cubby on the shelf
tasks.task_desc: Move a CD to the shelving unit

high_descs: Turn to your right and go across the room to the dresser.
Pick up the CD, to the right of the pencil, on the dresser.
Turn around and go to the book shelf on your left, just past the window.
Place the CD on the bottom, left shelf, to the right of the books.
tasks.task_desc: Put a CD in the book shelf.

high_descs: Move across the room to the right side of the white dresser top
Pick up the CD on top of the dresser on the right side
Carry the CD to the brown shelving unit against the wall
Place the CD on the bottom left cubby of the shelf
tasks.task_desc: Move a CD to the shelving unit

high_descs: Turn right, go to the front of the dresser
Pick up the cd on the dresser
Turn around, go forward, turn left in front of the shelf
Put the cd on the bottom shelf
tasks.task_desc: Put a cd on the shelf

high_descs: Turn around, walk to the side of the bed
Grab the book that is near the other side of the bed
Turn around and walk to the dresser
Put the book down by the key chain
tasks.task_desc: Move one of the book on the bed to the dresser by the key chain

high_descs: Turn around, walk towards the door, then turn left to face the bed.
Pick up the book that is to the right on the laptop on the bed.
Turn around and head towards the dresser.
Place the book to the right of the keys on the dresser.
tasks.task_desc: Place the book from the bed to the dresser.

high_descs: Turn around to the left and go to the table.
Pick up the magazine from the table.
Turn around find the dresser along the wall.
Put the magazine on the top of the dresser.
tasks.task_desc: Take a magazine to the dresser.

high_descs: Turn left and face the dresser with the clock on it.
Pick the pen up from the dresser.
Turn around and the face the box on the floor.
Put the pen in the box.
tasks.task_desc: Put a pen in a box.

high_descs: turn to the left and go to the dresser
pick up a pen from the dresser
turn to the right and take a few steps and turn to the right and go to the middle of the bed and turn to the left and go to the box
put the pen in the box
tasks.task_desc: Place a pen in a box.

high_descs: turn left, walk to the dresser
pick up the pen that is on the dresser
turn around, walk forward, turn left
put the pen on the bottom shelf of the shelves in front of you
tasks.task_desc: move pen from desk to shelf

high_descs: Turn left and walk towards the dresser.
Pick up the CD from the dresser.
Take a few steps to the left to face the alarm clock.
Open up the bottom drawer below the alarm clock and place the CD in it.
Look up at the CD next to the lamp.
Pick up the CD.
Look down towards the drawer below the alarm clock.
Open up the bottom drawer below the alarm clock and place the CD in it.
tasks.task_desc: Place the CDs inside the bottom drawer below the alarm clock.

high_descs: turn left, walk to the dresser
grab the disc on the dresser
turn around,  and turn around to the left part of the dresser
open the bottom left drawer in the dresser, put the disc in, close the drawer
walk to the left side of the dresser
grab the disc on the dresser
turn right,turn around, face the drawer
put the disc in the bottom left drawer
tasks.task_desc: move the discs on the dresser to the bottom left drawer

high_descs: Turn to your left and face the right side of the chest of drawers
Pick up the CD off of the top of the chest of drawers
Move to the left side of the chest of drawers
Open the second drawer from the bottom and put the cd in it
Move left and then turn to your right to face the side of the chest of drawers
Pick up another CD off of the top of the chest of drawers
Move back to where you were standing on the left side of the chest of the drawers
Open the second drawer from the bottom and put the other cd in it
tasks.task_desc: Put a pair of CD's away in a chest of drawers

high_descs: Turn directly around to the dresser behind you.
Grab the CD that is right in front of you.
With the CD in hand turn and go to the front of the dresser.
Place the CD in the third drawer down on the right side of the dresser.  Place it on the back left side of the drawer.
Turn and go to the other side of the dresser so you are facing the alarm clock.
Pick up the CD that is to the left of the statue.
Turn around and go to the right side of the dresser with the CD in hand.
Open the third from the top on the right side drawer.  Place the CD in the drawer to the right of the other CD that is in there.
tasks.task_desc: Put the CDs away.

high_descs: Walk to the dresser on your right and face it
Pick up one CD on the right dresser top
Turn to the left dresser drawer
Open the top left dresser drawer and place the CD inside
Close the top left dresser drawer
Pick up CD behind the alarm clock on the dresser top
Turn to the left dresser drawer
Open the top left dresser drawer and place the CD inside and close it
tasks.task_desc: Putting away CD's in the dresser drawer

high_descs: Turn left and walk straight ahead to the alarm clock.
Pick up the alarm clock.
Turn around and veer right to the dresser.
Place the alarm clock on middle of the dresser, all the way forward to the ledge.
tasks.task_desc: Place an alarm clock on a dresser.

high_descs: step to the bed and turn to the left and go forward past the bed and turn to the right and take a few steps and turn to the left and go to the window
pick up the clock from the window sill
turn to the left twice and go to the bed and turn to the right and take a few steps and turn to the left and take a few steps and turn to the right and go to the dresser
put the clock on the dresser
tasks.task_desc: Place a clock on a dresser

high_descs: turn to the left, walk to the window and shelf opposite the bed, face the window and sill with an alarm clock
pick up the alarm clock from the window sill
turn left, walk to the dresser drawers, face the dresser drawers
put the alarm clock on top of the dresser drawers to the left of the book
tasks.task_desc: move an alarm clock to dresser drawers

high_descs: Turn left then head to the back right wood shelving
Pick up the clock sitting on the shelf
Carry the clock over to the dresser against the wall
Move the clock to the left of the computer on top of the dresser
tasks.task_desc: Move a clock to the dresser

high_descs: Go to the left and then right and then turn to the left to face the shelving unit.
Pick the clock up from the shelf.
Go left and cross the room and stand in front of the dresser.
Put the clock down on the left side of the dresser.
tasks.task_desc: Put a clock on a dresser.

high_descs: Turn left and move across the room to the shelving that sits across from the foot of the bed.
Pick up the alarm clock that is on the shelf.
Turn left and walk across the room to the dresser.
Place the alarm clock on the dresser to the left of the laptop.
tasks.task_desc: Move an alarm clock to the dresser.

high_descs: Move to the left then go straight back to the brown shelving unit against the wall
Pick up the alarm clock on top of the shelf
Carry the alarm clock to the brown and white dresser facing the top left side
Place the alarm clock on top of the dresser to the left of the statue
tasks.task_desc: Move an alarm clock to the dresser

high_descs: Turn left, proceed to bed.  Move around bed, proceed to window.  Turn left, proceed to shelf.
Pick up alarm clock from right third shelf down.
Turn left, proceed to end of bed.  Turn left then right and proceed to dresser.
Place alarm clock directly to the left of the statue.
tasks.task_desc: Move alarm clock from shelf to dresser.

high_descs: Turn left and veer left to the shelves opposite the foot of the bed.
Pick up the red alarm clock.
Turn left and veer left to the dresser.
Put the alarm clock on the dresser to the left of the trophy.
tasks.task_desc: Place an alarm clock on a dresser.

high_descs: Turn to the right, walk to the door, then turn left and face the bed.
Close the laptop that is on the bed and pick it up.
Turn around completely, walk to the wall, then turn right and face the dresser.
Turn on the lamp that is on the dresser.
tasks.task_desc: Examine a laptop by the light of a lamp.

high_descs: Turn right and walk to the door, then turn left and go to the bed
Close the laptop that is sitting on the bed then pick up the laptop
Turn around and walk to the mirror then turn right and face the end of the dresser
Turn on the lamp that is sitting on the dresser
tasks.task_desc: Look at a laptop by lamp light

high_descs: Turn to your right and walk in the direction of the door, hang a left to the head of the bed.
Close the lid of the laptop on the bed and pick the laptop up.
Turn around and walk to the lamp to the right of the mirror on the wall.
Tilt the lampshade towards you, turn the lamp on.
tasks.task_desc: Pick up a laptop from the bed, turn on the lamp
